version_description:
iPhone / iPad update
• The overview / features / specifications tab on car details is now docked for your convenience. We hope that this provides a better experience for you.
• Introducing repayment search - see monthly repayments in your search results based on your repayment criteria
• Improved app stability, squashed more reported bugs (thank you for all your feedback)

Please use Feedback in app or email us at iphoneapp@carsales.com.au for any suggestions and bugs. We are always improving.

iPhone / iPad update

Introducing PayProtect, a new and safer way buy and sell your car. No need to carry cash or get a bank cheque, now you can safely and securely purchase or sell your car online within our messages platform. Just tap PayProtect in the menu for more info.


In addition to PayProtect:
• We've updated saved car listings - try comparing your saved cars
• Cached data will be deleted periodically to keep your app footprint small
• Improved app stability, squashed more reported bugs (thank you for all your feedback)

Please use Feedback in app or email us at iphoneapp@carsales.com.au for any suggestions and bugs. We are always improving.

Bug fixes and stability enhancements.

New in version 2.18:

Introducing PayProtect, a new and safer way buy and sell your car. No need to carry cash or get a bank cheque, now you can safely and securely purchase or sell your car online within our messages platform. Just tap PayProtect in the menu for more info.

In addition to PayProtect:
• We've updated saved car listings - try comparing your saved cars
• Cached data will be deleted periodically to keep your app footprint small
• Improved app stability, squashed more reported bugs (thank you for all your feedback)

Please use Feedback in app or email us at iphoneapp@carsales.com.au for any suggestions and bugs. We are always improving.

• New landing page (Home)
• Improved app stability, squashed more reported bugs (thank you for all your feedback)

Please use Feedback in app or email us at iphoneapp@carsales.com.au for any suggestions and bugs. We are always improving.

This updates gives you the ability to discover items that can be purchased and delivered to your home.

If you have any comments or feedback we'd love to hear from you via iosapp@carsales.com.au.

Thanks for using carsales! We are always trying to make improvements/enhancements to your app browsing experience. We highlighted that our hub navigation has become a bit dated and needed a refresh to provide the same content that you know and love in the best possible format. After conducting market research and significant user testing, we are excited to share with you the new tabbed navigation. We’ve categorised all that content into five tabs with the aim of making it easier to browse and navigate throughout the app. We hope you enjoy this new navigation as much as we have enjoyed bringing it to you. Stay tuned for other exciting new optimisations.

If you have any comments or feedback we'd love to hear from you via iosapp@carsales.com.au.

We've rebuilt the sign in flow to make this process as easy and seamless as possible. This sign up flow also includes the ability to 'Sign in with Google' and the new 'Sign In with Apple' feature which allows you to sign in to carsales with your Apple ID. We are also releasing some bug fixes and also some improvements; like remembering which Saved tab you were last using. We are continuing to listen to your feedback around the new tabbed navigation and monitoring the performance of the app to deliver the best user experience.
Stability and performance enhancements.

Fixes a bug with sorting saved cars.

- Refreshed the UI of saved searches
- Fixed a bug with deep linking
- Other bug fixes and performance enhancements
Fixes a bug where the section headings would not pin to the top of the screen when scrolling through the details of a car.
Stability and performance enhancements.
Fixes a bug which resulted in signed in users being prompted to sign in / join when editing or creating an ad.
Stability and performance enhancements.

In this release we've added star ratings to be displayed for certain car dealers to give users greater transparency and confidence in their buying journey.

We've also expanded our previous Ad Type refinement, to give better granularity when filtering for a New/Demo/Used car, or from a Private/Dealer seller.
These options now appear under New/Used or under Seller Type (under the Other filter group).

Stability and performance enhancements.

This update fixes the bug that was causing the app to crash when the phone was rotated to landscape.
Stability and performance enhancements.

We're trying to track down a bug that’s causing the app to crash for a small number of users, and we're hoping this update fixes it. If you're still seeing this issue, please get in touch at iosapp@carsales.com.au.
Added support for some upcoming features - stay tuned - and fixed a bug in the ad creation process that prevented users from purchasing a history report or Privacy Protect.
Fixes an issue with sign in and saved items

This update includes:
• improvements to news and reviews articles
• more information displayed in the list of saved cars
• the ability for you to quickly filter by popular makes
• preliminary performance enhancements to the scrolling performance of the search results
• bug fixes

To help keep your experience as bug-free as possible carsales will soon support devices running iOS 13 and above only. If your device is running an older version of iOS please update to iOS 13 or above (if possible) to continue receiving updates to carsales.

This update fixes two bugs:
• Missing Dealer Review stars
• Display of ads on the search results screen on iPad
